Package com.ansi.scilla.web.common.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnsiURL
    Parses a "standard" url following the pattern:
    /installation/realm/command/filter1/filter2?parm1=value1&parm2=value2
    where installation is determined by the deployment paradigm, "realm" is the servlet we're working with (like "division" or "ticket").
    ApplicationWebObject  
    AppUtils  
    BuildDate  
    ColumnFilter
    Used in LookupQuery objects to filter results based on column name/value.
    Division2SessionDivisionTransformer  
    FieldMap
    Maps json field to/from database field; defines format and validation for standard CRUD servlet I/O
    MenuItem  
    SessionDivisionTransformer
    Transforms SessionDivision to (integer) divisionId
    UserPermission  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ColumnFilter.ComparisonType  
    JsonFieldFormat
    Formats that the abstract CRUD servlet understands
    Menu  
    MimeType  
    UserFavoriteType
